name: Fire Fighting VR
description:
这是一款虚拟现实消防体验，使用SteamVR运行时，您可以使用HTC Vive和Oculus等各种设备运行。游戏中，您扮演一名消防员对火情进行营救。我是一个独立开发者，该游戏全部由我制作，如果您觉得游戏好玩，请给我捐款。您的每一比资金对我来说都无比感激。我将更有动力开发一些免费的独立游戏。

It's a virtual reality firefighting experience that you can run with various devices like the HTC Vive and Oculus when running with SteamVR. In the game, you play as a firefighter to rescue the fire. I'm an indie developer and this game is all made by me, if you like the game, please donate to me. I'm so grateful for every bit of your funding. I will be more motivated to develop some free indie games.
